welcome_message_body: Welcome to Suceava, Romania! Get ready to be charmed by the city's rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Suceava has to offer.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Salcea Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Salcea Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
